sentences.en: He stained his military record by going AWOL [ a. w . o . l . = absent without official leave ] .
sentences.cn: 他因擅 离职 守而玷污了军绩.

sentences.en: He stained the wood reddish - brown .
sentences.cn: 他给木头涂上了 红褐色.

sentences.en: Her sweat-stained clothing clung to her body.
sentences.cn: 她那被汗水浸透的衣服黏在身上。

sentences.en: His black cassock was dusty and sweat - stained.
sentences.cn: 他黑色的袍子上尽是尘土,汗渍斑斑.

sentences.en: His clothing was stained with mud.
His crimes stained the family honour.
sentences.cn: 他的罪行玷污了家庭的名誉.

sentences.en: His teeth were stained with nicotine from years of smoking.
sentences.cn: 他的牙齿因多年抽烟而被尼古丁染黄了.

sentences.en: His white coat was grubby and stained.
sentences.cn: 他的白色外套污迹斑斑，简直脏透了。
我的连衣裙弄上了污渍。

sentences.en: Nicotine marks stained his chin and fingers.
sentences.cn: 尼古丁渍染黄了他的下巴和手指。

sentences.en: Not stained strongly or definitely by either acid or basic dyes but stained readily by neutral dyes. Used especially of white blood cells.
sentences.cn: 嗜中性染料的不一定非用酸性或碱性染剂染色不可的，也易于用中性染剂染色的，尤其指白细胞。

sentences.en: The clothes are stained with grease.
The doors are then stained and varnished.
sentences.cn: 这些门还要染色涂清漆。

sentences.en: The stained-glass panels are etched and then handpainted using traditional methods.
sentences.cn: 彩色玻璃板先经过蚀刻，然后用传统技法手工着色。

sentences.en: There was a stained-glass window with the family coat of arms.
sentences.cn: 有一扇饰有家族盾形纹章的彩色玻璃窗。

words.tran_cn: 不锈的；纯洁的，未被玷污的；无瑕疵的
玷污；败坏；给…染色（stain的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 彩色玻璃（镶嵌在教堂的窗户）

trans.tran_cn: （使）染色( stain的过去式和过去分词 )，褪色，变污，玷污，败坏（名声）
